    Gear and Gadgets

    Smart kit and handy tools to make motorhome life smoother.

    üîß Everyday Essentials

    • Levelling blocks ‚Äì Keep your motorhome steady and your sleep comfortable.
    • Head torch ‚Äì Hands-free light for late-night arrivals or dog walks.
    • Reusable water bottles ‚Äì Better for the planet and handy on hikes.
    • Multi-tool ‚Äì Saves the day when something needs a quick fix.

    üì± Tech Helpers

    • Portable Wi-Fi hotspot ‚Äì Stay connected without draining your phone data.
    • Solar charger ‚Äì Keep devices powered off-grid.
    • Dash cam ‚Äì Useful for recording journeys and protecting against disputes.
    • Bluetooth speaker ‚Äì Compact, with volume low enough for campsite etiquette.

    üç≥ Kitchen Kit

    • Collapsible kettle ‚Äì Saves space but still delivers a proper brew.
    • Stackable pans ‚Äì Nest neatly in cupboards.
    • Reusable food containers ‚Äì Ideal for leftovers or prepped meals.
    • Portable BBQ ‚Äì Compact and campsite-friendly.

    üêæ Dog-Friendly Gear

    • Travel crate or bed ‚Äì Gives your dog a safe, familiar space.
    • Portable water bowl ‚Äì Essential for walks and day trips.
    • Lead hooks ‚Äì Clip onto the motorhome for quick tethering.
    • Paw wipes ‚Äì Keep mud outside where it belongs.

    üõ†Ô∏è Nice-to-Have Extras

    • Foldable chairs & table ‚Äì Lightweight and easy to store.
    • Compact heater/fan ‚Äì For chilly nights or hot afternoons.
    • Binoculars ‚Äì Spot wildlife or enjoy scenic views.
